content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Pakal samayatthe addhvaananga llil ninnu nyangallude shareeram viramikkukayum, laukikachintakallilninnu nyangallude manassu pinvaangukayum cheythukondu ee sandhyaasamayatthu shaantamaayi thirusannidhiyil nilako nd. Nithyasthuthikallum thudarchayaaya sthothrangallum ninakkarppi kkuvaanum nyangallude jeevane samrakshichu nayikkunnavanum nyangallude aathmaakkallude sahaayiyum rakshithaavumaaya ninte krpaykku sthuthi paaduvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Nyangall ninakku sthuthiyum sothravum karettunnu. Hosho...

Yaachikkunnu-nyangallodoppam
Nyangallkkaay-praarththhikkuka nee
Nrpapathi savidham-shamavum shaantiyu-
Mulakengum vaazhattathinaal
Sadayam nee-kkeedatte-sakala nivaasangallil ni-
Nnarishatthin dandam

Naathhane vaazhtthuvinutthamare!
Parimalladhoopayutham-daivatthin janani
Kanyakamariyaammi nnormma bhavikkatte

Bhaagyam nibiyarkkum bhaagyam shleeharkkum
Bhaagyam sahaderkkum-punaruththhaanadine

Mashihaaye kaanmaan-kaamkshichoru sahader
Vaallaal chirakukall poo-ndunnatha padameri

Neethiyil vidhi cheyyum-nyaayaadhipathe! Nee!
Yettaruthe vidhiyil-kadamorttheedaruthe.

Vaanilumoozhiyiledanilum haalelooyyaa
Dayaraa devaagaarangalli-lellaadatthum
Kanyakamariyaamminnundaa-katte nallormma
Nirmmalamaam kanyaathvatthil-thiruvullamaarnnu
Raajaadheeshanirangi vasichavall thannudaratthil
/tbhoovi svarga-thalsmrthi vallaratte
/tkottayathaay-praarththhana theeratte
Naathhaa! Cherkkuka nyangalle nin-maathrsmaranatthil

Vaazhverum nirmmala kanyaka-thannudaratthil
Hithamodudayam cheythoru-daivasuthaa!Sthothram the!
Karnnatthaalavane kaikko-ndudare peri
Garbhaashaya kanyaamudrakalleennum-nirgathanaay
/tjaathikalle-lajaakularaakki
/tsthuthiyadhikam thaazhvarichone!
Naranaayu rakshakodutthavane-sabha keertthikkunnu.

Praarththhippin shleehanmaare!-kartthaavodaayu
Bhinnathasabhathan santaanangallili-llaathaavaan
Ningallathil cholliyathaakum-vishvaasatthe
Maayichiduvaan dusthaarkkika-rathine chuttunnu.
/tsathyamathaam-mooshayilaavachanam
/tkanakampol-shodhicheedatte
Vaidikar vaazhtthum shuddhasabha-ykkudayam chertthone.

Krooshinmel thalachaayichon-valabhaagatthaayu
Mudimudayunnathu kandappoll-sahadenmaar ningall
Naanaavidha yaathanayeyum-kooseedaathe
Gallarudhiratthaal dhavallimayam-gangallkkullavaakki
/tpeedakalle-venniha mashihaaye
/tsnehichor-dhanyanmaar ningall
Bhoosvargangallilerunnoo-smaranam ningallkkaay.

Maartthommaa! Pandithavaidyaa! Rogaarttharkkaayu
Saukhyamiyattiduvaanadhikaaram the! Nalki paran
Paartthaal ninnasthhikallathre nyangallkkabhayam
Nyangade yaachana nin praarththhana-yaal nalkeedatte
/taarogyam-vyaadhigrasthharkkum
/tvishraamam-peeditha janathaykkum
Kshama nyangallkkum prathyaagamanam-doorasthharkkum.

Aahvaanam cheyyunnuthavi-kketthuka naathhaa!
Kalahippikkunnulakatthe dushdan-vanchanayaal
Bhinnatha nrpavidhi kartthaakkalli-lavanullavaakki
Dhaarmmikareyum veezhippaan vazhi no-kkeedunnu.
/tkartthaave!-nin karunayilenye
/tsangketham-nyangallkkengulllloo
Dushdane nyangallil ninnodikkuka-nin-sleebaayaal.

Nyaayaadhipanyaayaadhipathe!-yangeykkarisham
Cherttha kadatthaalen thalathaazhttharuthe vidhi gehe
Mochanayogyathayillengkilu mennilirikkum
Nintirumeyyum rakthavumortthenmel krpa cheyka
/tnin snehaal sleebaa nyaan kooppi
/tpizhapokki-ninmeyu rudhirangall
Hithamodukarunaamayaneesho-mama nalkuka mukthi.

Khedam vendaa mashihaayil-mrthi poondore!
Aasannam prathiphalamekum punaruththhaanadinam
Kedenye kabarukalleennum-ningallezhunne
Ttathivegam raajaathmajane yethirelppaanetthum
/tmahimaavin neeraallam chaartthi
/tthirumumpil sthuthipaadum ningall
Kanivaalaadaam suthajeevapradane-krpacheyka.

Ninnaall sthuthiyodu raajamakall haale.....
Nin valamaayu raajabhaaminiyum
Ninnazhakarachan mohippaan haale......
Nin janamorkkaaykku pithrgrhavum.

Aardrathayaal daasi-vinayam thrkkanpaarttho-
Ramalan Daivam thanjanani-kkekidunnaanaunnathyam.

Chonnaall mariyaam nin shakthyaa-ninne vahichen
Janane guhayil ninmahimaa-venne nee kaatti
Kaallunnacherupulkkoodinu-chuttilumerithee
Paarunnuparithale chira-kaarullllor sroppenmaar
/tkartthaave! Pakshamuyartthiduvaa-
/tnavarodu nee-kalpicheedaname
Vannu vanangitthiruhithamaam-sthanyam nyaan nalkaan.

Mannaacheppodu niyamatthin pettiyodathishu-
Ddhaagaare thallirekiyoraharon than dandodum
Gidayon grhakampillimanyo-deleeshaathan
Navakumbhatthoduthejomaya-naameshaayaa than
/tthvarayerum-mukilodum mooshaa
/tnibimukhyan-vaazhsezhumammaye nal
Pravachananiyama sthhaanangalli-lampodupamichu.

Maathya vishuddha smrthi sambandham nalkuka naathhaa!
Thal praarththhanayaal punyamivarkkum mrtharaayorkkum

Daavidu puthree! Bhoopaalare neekkum bhoopangkal
Svaathantyam the! Kaanmathinaale yaachikkunnu
Nirmmalamaanikkakkalle! Nee ninniludicha
Phalamaayonodarththhikkaname nyangallkkaayi

Kallaravaasam cheyyum mrthare! Neduka dhairyam
Thalsandesham kellppin savidham punaruththhaanam
Daampathyatthin jadhare! Roopam nalkiyoraamgyam
Aahvaanatthaalazhivenya meyyezhunnelppikkum

Bhaagyavathikkum siddharkkum mrtharaam bhaktharkkum
Smrthiyuyaratthilumee sabhayilumundaayidatte.

Nyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! / Ninte karunayude vaathil nyangallude nere nee adaykkaruthe / kartthaave! Nyangall paapikallaakunnu /  ennu nyangall ettu parayunnu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
Kartthaave! Ninte maranatthaal / nyangallude maranam maayikkappeduvaanaayittu / ninte sneham ninte sthhaanatthuninnu nyangallude adukkalekku ninne irakkikkondu vannu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
